p: To generate a more reliable GFP reporter ZIKV for flow cytometry neutralization test, recombinant ZIKV GFP was repeatedly passaged on Vero cells using a limiting dilution cloning method [ 13]. A single virus clone, hereafter named MR766 GFP, was selected for further studies. The progeny virus production of MR766 GFP variant in Vero cells was at least 1.5 log higher than for parental ZIKV GFP [ 13]. Expression of MR766 GFP was examined in Vero cells infected at a multiplicity of infection (m.o.i.) of 1 ( Figure 1). We observed that most of the virus plaques produced in the focus-forming assay were positively stained by anti-GFP antibody ( Figure 1A). Flow-cytometry analysis confirmed that Vero cells positive for GFP expression were recognized by the anti-E mAb 4G2 ( Figure 1B). Thus, the MR766 GFP variant is a suitable GFP reporter ZIKV for the development of a FNT.
